text: Bourgoin () is a French surname. Like the related Bourgoing, Bourgoyne and Bourguignon it is a name denoting a person from Burgundy () and therefore of toponymic origin. Notable people with this name include: * (1836–1897), French physician and politician *Gérard Bourgoin (born 1939), French businessman, sports chairman and politician *Jean Bourgoin (1913–1991), French cinematographer *Louise Bourgoin (born 1981), French actress, model and television presenter *Stéphane Bourgoin (born 1953), French writer ==References== Category:French-language surnames
title: Bourgoin (surname)
